Client IPC API. Client IPC API'.
Lifecycle of an IPC connection. Lifecycle of an IPC connection'.
An IPC connection is made to the server with qb_ipcc_connect(). An IPC connection is made to the server with qb_ipcc_connect()'.
This function connects to the server and requests channels be This function connects to the server and requests channels be
created for communication. To disconnect, the client either exit created for communication'. To disconnect, the client either exi
s ts
or executes the function qb_ipcc_disconnect(). or executes the function qb_ipcc_disconnect()'.

receives a response. receives a response'.

function qb_ipcc_send() sends an message buffer request. function qb_ipcc_send() sends an message buffer request'.
Asynchronous events from the server Asynchronous events from the server

asyncronous message. The asynchronous messages are queued and ca asyncronous message'. The asynchronous messages are queued and c
n an
provide very high out-of-band performance. To determine when to provide very high out-of-band performance'. To determine when to
call qb_ipcc_event_recv() the qb_ipcc_fd_get() call is used to call qb_ipcc_event_recv() the qb_ipcc_fd_get() call is used to
